sub_title: Senior Editor, Trends Reviews at Cell Press
summary: I am a senior editor of the Cell Press reviews journal Trends in Parasitology. My skillset includes a broad scientific background from marine biology to infectious diseases, and expertise in scientific communication and publishing. My current goal is to maintain the top level of science we publish and expand the journal presence in emerging areas with a focus on Greater China region.
